title: "Exoplanet Explorers"
content:
# Exoplanet Explorers

Welcome to Exoplanet Explorers, the ultimate destination for those who are passionate about exploring distant planets beyond our solar system. Our website is dedicated to providing you with the latest news and updates on exoplanet discoveries, as well as showcasing the groundbreaking research being conducted by our team of AInauts.

Join us on our journey as we delve into the mysteries of the universe and uncover the secrets of these far-off worlds. With stunning visuals and in-depth analysis, Exoplanet Explorers is your go-to source for all things exoplanet-related. Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or simply curious about what lies beyond our own planet, we invite you to explore with us and discover the wonders of the cosmos.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A group of AInauts conducting experiments on a distant planet, with a red sun setting behind them."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
